original_text: Each year, on the 14th day of the first month, you must start the Passover festival. The festival will continue for seven days. During that time you must not eat any bread that has yeast in it.
korean_text: 첫째 달 열나흗날에는 유월절을 칠 일 동안 명절로 지키며 누룩 없는 떡을 먹을 것이라

sentences.original_text: on the 14th day of the first month
you must start the Passover festival
The festival will continue for seven days
you must not eat any bread that has yeast in it
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 누룩이 든 빵을 먹어서는 안 된다
